title: Thinking It Through - purpose of reference

content.question: At the beginning of the passage, the author refers to “countless movies” primarily to

choices.label: emphasize ongoing conversations about the questions discussed in the passage
introduce the idea of intelligent computers in a way that the audience will likely find relatable
suggest that fictional stories can be a tool for exploring real-life problems
identify an industry in which people are increasingly dependent on computing technology

content.answer: introduce the idea of intelligent computers in a way that the audience will likely find relatable

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
